price: 49.Kaadu giráh addal yan mari jahannam dacrissa malaykak sin Rabbi neh kallacay digaalák inki ayró neh xabbacoysam keh iyyen.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna fī al-nāri likhazanati jahannama id'ʿū rabbakum yukhaffif ʿannā yawman mina al-ʿadhābi
